body_html:
I was able to create tensorflow 0.7.1 conda packages and wheel files from source which should work with the Python shipped with Anaconda. Files are available for both linux-64 and osx-64 for Python 2.7, 3.4 and 3.5 in my Anaconda.org channel.

I believe with the release of 0.7.1 this issue can be closed.
body_text:
I was able to create tensorflow 0.7.1 conda packages and wheel files from source which should work with the Python shipped with Anaconda.  Files are available for both linux-64 and osx-64 for Python 2.7, 3.4 and 3.5 in my Anaconda.org channel.
I believe with the release of 0.7.1 this issue can be closed.
body:
I was able to create tensorflow 0.7.1 conda packages and wheel files from source which should work with the Python shipped with Anaconda.  Files are available for both linux-64 and osx-64 for Python 2.7, 3.4 and 3.5 in my [Anaconda.org channel](https://anaconda.org/jjhelmus/tensorflow).  

I believe with the release of 0.7.1 this issue can be closed.
